title: Card Game Sound Effects
description: Create an outstanding fantasy card gaming experience with ESM's hottest new game sound effects library Card Game. Brings you the energy of online card gaming mixed with the epicness and adventure.
longDescription:
Audio Demo

Video Demo

Create an outstanding fantasy card gaming experience with ESM's hottest new game sound effects library “Card Game”. Inspired by hit fantasy card games like HearthStone - Card Game brings you the energy of online card gaming mixed with the epicness and adventure or World of Warcraft. Presented in high quality 16bit 44.1k .wav file format, Card Game brings you the amazing quality of sounds of quality game studios without breaking the bank.

Enjoy warm, bubbly fantasy sound and a world-class selection of soft and dynamic card gaming sound effects to help you embark on your next game audio and fantasy production. Shuffle the card deck, Deal, play special effects. Start to trigger the power-ups and upgrade your items by casting magic spells, buffs, and so much more. All included in the deck with Card Game.

Veteran sound designers and game devs rally to Card Game... It’s jam-packed with every asset you need in one convenient complete pack. We all know how important it is to have the right sound. With years of experience and after multiple foley sessions, and months of time spent in post sound design production, we are proud to release Card Game into the gaming community. We are sure your audience will recognize, cherish and love these cute and fun-filled fantasy game audio assets. Sound like top grossing mobile and console fantasy games with Card Game.
technicalDetails:
• 503 Game Ready Audio Assets
  • 268.4 MB
  • Online Fantasy Card Game Sound Effects Library
  • 33 Abilities, Poofs, Pops, Water Missiles, Wind Blasts & Movement, Shimmers, Shields
  • 26 Achievements, Chimes, Glimmer, Grand, Poofs, Shimmers, Twinkles, Wisps
  • 61 Game Actions, Bashes, Blocks, Breaks, Deflects, Cracks, Health Packs, & more
  • 22 Alerts, Advances, Turn Passed, Time Freeze, Next Round, & more
  • 8 Game Ambience Loops, Beach, Cave, Dungeon, Forest, & more
  • 33 Card Movements, Deal, Shuffle, Tap, Cycle, Deck, Bets, Light, Singles, & Multiple Card Movements
  • 52 Special Effects, Bless, Shrine Buff, Expose, Fracture, Liquify, Lock, Miniaturize, Poof, & more
  • 33 Items, Boulder Slam, Cork Pop, Glass Break, Potion, & more
  • 34 Magic, Crackle, Punches, Smash, Shield, Glitter Missile, Launch, Pierce, Shot, Shimmer, Seal, Ice, Earth, Reinforce
  • 38 Plays, Bop, Hush, Mech Arms, Punch Metal, Shield, Skip Turn, Slam, Water, Swirl, Switch
  • 49 Upgrades, Buffs, Crystals, Earth Strength, Flutter,
  • 114 UI, General, Silly, Light, Heavy, Bubbles, Pops, Clicks, Thunks, & more

Number of Audio Waves: 502

Number of Audio Cues: 502

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: Some

Minutes of audio provided: 20

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5,

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5,
